title: Poussin with garlic and rosemary
ingredients: ['4 poussin', '3 tablespoons olive oil, divided', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 lemon, quartered', '4 sprigs fresh rosemary', '24 cloves garlic', '5 tablespoons white wine', '5 tablespoons chicken stock', '4 sprigs fresh rosemary, for garnish']
